description: MKC stands for Medical link chain chain.The Medical link chain will usher in a new era in the application of block chain in the Medical field. MKC based on Block chainless architecture and combined with the Internet of things and big data technologies, such as covering medical treatment, medicine, health care, pension, and socialization of medical services in the areas of supply chain alliance chain.MKC is a distributed intelligent contract medical Internet of things big data aggregation platform.D transfer chain MKC will use the block chain technology and mechanism of consensus, create a new frame of medicine health industry chain, to institutional users and doctors can realize real-time data connection and instant seamless to share information, promote the construction of medical service system integrity, benefit the public.
name: Medical Link Chain
